name: details_elitism
description: A simple *Details!* plugin which provides similar data from [ElitismHelper](https://github.com/amki/ElitismHelper) but inside Details!.

scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md && conventional-changelog -p angular --skip-unstable -o PARTIALCHANGELOG.md && git add PARTIALCHANGELOG.md
